query.value: SELECT N_OWNER_IDX, V_URL, V_ACCESS_DATETIME FROM TIMECLOUD_ACCESSLOG
SELECT N_OWNER_IDX, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM TIMECLOUD_ACTIVITY WHERE C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND V_REG_DATETIME LIKE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymm')||'%') GROUP BY N_OWNER_IDX ORDER BY cnt DESC
SELECT N_OWNER_IDX, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK WHERE C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND V_REG_DATETIME LIKE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymm')||'%') GROUP BY N_OWNER_IDX ORDER BY cnt DESC
SELECT N_OWNER_IDX, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM TIMECLOUD_FILE WHERE C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND V_REG_DATETIME LIKE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymm')||'%') GROUP BY N_OWNER_IDX ORDER BY cnt DESC
SELECT N_OWNER_IDX, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM TIMECLOUD_OBSERVER WHERE C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND V_REG_DATETIME LIKE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymm')||'%') GROUP BY N_OWNER_IDX ORDER BY cnt DESC
SELECT N_OWNER_IDX, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_LEVEL>0 AND C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND V_REG_DATETIME LIKE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymm')||'%') GROUP BY N_OWNER_IDX ORDER BY cnt DESC
query.description: 태스크 할당을 가장 많이 받은 사람 월별랭킹

query.value: SELECT N_OWNER_IDX, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND V_REG_DATETIME LIKE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymm')||'%') GROUP BY N_OWNER_IDX ORDER BY cnt DESC
